{"id":1250618531,"question_id":3384,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 month, 4 weeks","timestamp":1714977200,"status":11,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/1250618531/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Minimum Number of Operations to Make Word K-Periodic","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int minimumOperationsToMakeKPeriodic(string word, int k) {\n        int n = word.length();\n        int operations = INT_MAX;\n\n        // Iterate over all possible starting indices for k-periodic substrings\n        for (int start = 0; start < k; ++start) {\n            // Initialize the count for current starting index\n            int count = 0;\n            for (int i = start; i < n; i += k) {\n                // If the character at index i is different from the character at the starting index,\n                // increment the count\n                if (word[i] != word[start]) {\n                    count++;\n                }\n            }\n            // Update the minimum operations required\n            operations = min(operations, count);\n        }\n\n        return operations;\n    }\n};\n","compare_result":"","title_slug":"minimum-number-of-operations-to-make-word-k-periodic","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
